name: Diggin' Dinos
description:
You are a digging unit in search of all 10 parts of a long lost T-Rex skeleton. Find all the pieces to win! Just be careful not to step on any bombs.

In this very strategic game, you'll have to drill your way into 3 different ground levels, calculating (and also sometimes gambling...) every move in order to survive.

You have 2 differet tools, the drill, which is your go to digging device, and also the pickaxe that reveals what's ahead of you before you take a step.

Your radar is also very important, it will tell you how many bombs or T-Rex Bones are nearby!

Be safe and happy diggin' !
